releases.name: Release 1.0.174
releases.author: manishjain999
releases.body:
- Updated build: Tooltip for “AI powered blocking” does not display any content #709 
- [Recommendation] Remove empty option in the drop #227 (popup completely removed)
- The color of the "X" button blends into the background (on the popup for the focus session).  #502 (by pedro) 
- Break Timer Does Not Always Re-Prompt to Start Another Focus Session #814 

Release notes for end users:
- Tooltips enhanced
- Enhanced flow for Finishing a Focus Session bey eliminating unwanted screens or popups in the flow
- User will be automatically prompted for starting a focus session after the break from the previous focus session ends.
- UI enhancements

releases.name: Release 1.0.175
releases.author: manishjain999
releases.body:
Release v 1.0.175
v 1.0.175 - PRs merged, fixes for updated focus session windows (Redesign focus window todos and fixes
#837) / implemnted individual focus alignment threshold for each focus mode and synced with mac / youtube-nocookie added for video urls / Temporary site unblock (10-minute option) not working #834 / Website blocking dialog not appearing for active tabs; blocking fails after user response #828

Release notes for end users:
- Enhanced the UI/UX for starting a focus session in Simple as well as Geek Mode
- Implemented Focus alignment score threshold to be set specifically for each focus mode in Geek mode
- Bug fix for Youtube videos not loading properly
- Bug fixes and enhancements for website blocking
